timeline.message:
Extract: WebViewDebugging.initializeDebugging

I want to use this API from #1377

WebViewDebugging: Disable on unset preference

If the preference is unset, disable it the next time we use it.

timeline.bodyText: no quibble on the goal of the PR, but adding commented out code 🤔
timeline.author: mikehardy

replies.bodyText: Codacy would have caught that one. Would it be possible for you to email a key to check locally?
replies.author: david-allison-1

timeline.message:
WebViewDebugging: Handle on startup

When testing (printf), this has no noticeable difference if the setting
is off, and shaved 2ms off the call if it's on

timeline.bodyText: Android Studio makes these changes consistently in a few files within the project. I'll revert for now; are you using other settings to keep these in place?
timeline.author: david-allison-1

replies.bodyText: I dunno - I just searched preferences in Android Studio for 'import' and didn't see anything that would turn on or off auto-organization. I kind of like them organized myself though it is diff noise. At least it's noise in a place that no one really looks at anyway (w.r.t. diffs) so long as they aren't unused (which codacy catches, so I just skim that chunk). meh
replies.author: mikehardy
